name: AZURA
description: AZURA - exciting adventure story in the genre of RPG. Explore an unknown island. Classic combat turn-based system in the best traditions of JRPG, non-linear plot with the choice of the path and juicy anime graphics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 Ghz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 2 GB available space
